text: A yau an halatta muku abubuwa masu daɗi kuma abincin waɗanda aka bai wa Littafi halal ne a gare ku, kuma abincinku halal ne a gare su, da mata masu kamun kai daga muminai da mata 'ya'ya daga waɗanda aka bai wa Littafi a gabaninku idan kun je musu da sadakokinsu, kuna masu yin aure, ba masu yin zina ba, kuma ba masu riƙon abokai ba. Kuma wanda ya kafirta da imani to, lalle ne aikinsa ya ɓaci, kuma shi, a cikin Lahira, yana daga masu hasara
